headline.main: CATHOLICS OFFER PRAYERS FOR DEAD; Remembrance of Feast of All Souls Asked by the Rev. W.F. King at St. Patrick's

lead_paragraph: Continuing prayers for our soldier and sailor dead, to be said today, the Feast of All Souls, and throughout the month, were asked yesterday by the Rev. William F. King in a sermon at solemn mass in St. Patrick's Cathedral.
abstract: Comdr J J Shea's lr to son quoted in St Patrick's Cath ser, NYC
snippet: Continuing prayers for our soldier and sailor dead, to be said today, the Feast of All Souls, and throughout the month, were asked yesterday by the Rev. William F. King in a sermon at solemn mass in St. Patrick's Cathedral....
